subject: RE: Admin endpoints 404 — Pull latest TEST branch
body:
Hey Quinn,

The admin endpoints are in TEST now. Your local needs to pull the latest.

## Fix

```bash
cd ~/MyDocs/AppDev/MasterCalendar/calendar-be-af
git checkout TEST
git pull origin TEST
# Restart your func start (or let dev-runner restart it)
```

## Branch Status

| Branch | Has Admin Endpoints |
|--------|--------------------|
| DEVL   | ✅ Yes |
| TEST   | ✅ Yes |
| PROD   | ❌ Not yet (pending merge) |

## Endpoints Available After Pull

- `GET /api/admin/data-health?appId=1`
- `GET /api/admin/user-activity?appId=1`

Both require function key in Azure, but locally they should work without auth.

## If Using dev-runner

The dev-runner watches for changes but won't auto-pull git. You need to:
1. Pull latest
2. Restart func (or kill the terminal pane and let dev-runner restart)

Let me know if it works after pulling.

— Fulton
